description: Newcomer Krist Cummings is up against Drake Jaden, a proven fighter on Naked Kombat. It might surprise you from his stature that Krist is an experienced grappler and professional wrestler with an unflinching passion for the sport. But taking on Drake Jaden's ripped body will be no easy task as he is an experienced Naked Kombat fighter. The past has shown us that previous fighting skills can only take a fighter so far. He has to deal with ass slapping, balls grabbing, cock stroking and more. How well does Krist acclimate to the dirty fighting style of NK?
title: Drake Jaden vs. Krist Cummings
